tool_description: Finds journal entries similar to a reference entry based on content, themes, and writing patterns.

reference_entry_id.description: ID of the entry to use as reference for similarity matching

similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score to include results (0.1-1.0)

max_results.description: Maximum number of similar entries to return (1-25)

error_messages: Invalid reference entry: Reference entry ID does not exist or is inaccessible
Invalid similarity_threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0
Invalid max_results: Must be between 1 and 25
Reference entry too short: Entry must have sufficient content for similarity analysis
usage: Provide reference_entry_id and optionally configure similarity_threshold, max_results, and similarity_factors to find related entries.

similar_entry_ids.description: IDs of entries similar to the reference entry, ranked by similarity

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores (0-1) for each matching entry

total_comparisons.description: Total number of entries compared for similarity
